law.catch_line: If a ground lease is not registered in accordance with this subtitle, the ground lease holder may no...
law.text:
If a ground lease is not registered in accordance with this subtitle, the ground lease holder may not:
Collect any ground rent payments due under the ground lease;
Bring a civil action against the leasehold tenant to enforce any rights the ground lease holder may have under the ground lease; or
Obtain a lien under § 8-402.3 of this title.
